job.title: Software Engineer (Backend)
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout Well HealthltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtOur Mission ltstronggtMake healthcare the gold standard in customer serviceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhat We Deliver ltstronggtWELL Health is a SaaS digital health leader in patient communications and the 2021 Best in KLAS winner in Patient Outreach WELL Healths intelligent communications hub is the only twoway digital health solution engaging patients throughout their entire care experience WELL Health enables conversations between patients and their providers through secure multilingual messaging in the patients preferred communications channel texting email telephone and live chat By unifying and automating disjointed communications WELL Health helps healthcare organizations drive more patient visits build exceptional patient loyalty and reduce staffing costs frustration and turnoverltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur Impactltstronggt WELL Health helps 200k healthcare providers facilitate more than 1 billion messages for 30 million patients annuallyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur awardwinning culture ltstronggtIn 2021 WELL Health was named No10 on the Forbes list of Americas Best Startup Employers and was also recognized as one of the Best Midsize Companies to Work for in Los Angeles by Built In LA In 2020 WELL Health was named among the Best Places to Work by Modern Healthcare and ranked 170 on the Inc 5000 list of fastest growing private companiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtSummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWELL is looking for a talented experienced backend developer to join our fastpaced growing engineering department ltstronggtThis developer will primarily be working with Nodejsltstronggt As a Backend Engineer at WELL you will work under the guidance of our Engineering Director in either a dedicated backend team or in a cross functional team of backend and frontend engineersltbrgtltbrgtYou will work with the rest of the team to maintain and grow features in the backend code base This will include supporting Nodejs web facing APIs writing SQL queries automating interactions with partner APIs and enhancing the core infrastructure that underlies our scheduled and realtime patientprovider communications capabilityltbrgtltbrgtIn addition to being a strong developer you will have a keen interest in how software and modern communication channels can improve the patient experience You will also have the attention to detail and quality needed to meet high Service Level Agreements SLAs in a product that serves roughly 30 million patients annually You will also be flexible and adaptable enough to thrive in a fluid startup environmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur Stack ltstronggtNode Typescript Express Nest Postgres Mongo AWS Hasura Temporalio React and ReduxltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtMaintain existing and build new backend services using Typescript on Nodejs open source technology and tools including NestJS and Expressltligt ltligtDrive quality by writing effective unit integration and e2e tests for high availability systems and librariesltligt ltligtCreate high availability and high throughput systems using Redis Postgres Kinesis S3 MongoDB EventBridge and other AWS servicesltligt ltligtEffectively collaborate with Product QA UX Client Success and other internal groups both technical and nontechnicalltligt ltligtOpportunity to work with infrastructureascode Terraform and frontend React if desiredltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtBachelors Degree in Computer Scienceltligt ltligt2 years designing and implementing backend services and distributed systems in a professional environmentltligt ltligtStrong grasp of JavascriptES fundamentals Typescript or strong experience in another modern OO languageltligt ltligtHigh level of proficiency in SQL PostgreSQL database designltligt ltligtExperienced working with asynchronous requests in large scale applicationsltligt ltligtCommitment to testing best practicesltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtBONUSltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtCollaborationcontributions with the open source communityltligt ltligtStrong leadership skillsltligt ltligtExperience withltligtltulgtltulgt ltligtPythonltligt ltligtDockerltligt ltligtTerraformltligt ltligtAWSltligt ltligtEvent sourced and microservice architectureltligt ltligtDomain Driven Designltligt ltulgt ltbrgtltstronggtLOCATIONltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWELL is headquartered in Santa Barbara CA and is opening a second office in Los Angeles CA Today all WELL positions are remote and we are looking forward to when our company returns to inoffice work We are open to candidates that are looking for a permanently remote role depending on their level of experience Historically remote team members visit the Santa Barbara office regularly and weve found that works best when they are on the West Coast specifically in Southern Californialtstronggt If this role sounds interesting to you we encourage you to apply We are happy to discuss any WFH preferences with the right candidateltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtWORKING AT WELLltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtltstronggtFantastic company culture  ltstronggtfrequent Zoom company events Lunch ampamp Learns trivia yoga etc and daily fun brought to you by many creative Slack channelsltligt ltligtltstronggtEmployee equity groups  ltstronggt11 groups available for all to join Black ampamp Latinx Women LGBTQ Disability and many moreltligt ltligtltstronggtLearning and development  ltstronggtfrequent events and tools available to help our employees PursueGrowthltligt ltligtltstronggtCareer mobility  ltstronggtwe promote from within and have opportunities for employees to transfer between teams ltligt ltligtltstronggtSanta Barbara office perksltstronggt ltstronggt ltstronggtdogfriendly office healthy and unhealthy snacks Kombucha and beer on tap lightfilled space standing desks and the occasional taco truck ltligt ltligtltstronggtCompany perks and benefitsltstronggt ltstronggt ltstronggtMacBook Pro provided unlimited PTO generous equity package and full health benefits medical dental and visionltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtInterested in learning more ltstronggtPlease visit our LinkedIn page or our Life at WELL Instagram profile to hear from our employees about working at WELLltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCommitted to Diversity Equity and InclusionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWELL Health Inc is an Equal Opportunity Employer and is committed to fair and equitable hiring practices All hiring decisions at WELL are based on strategic business needs job requirements and individual qualifications All candidates are considered without regard to race color religion gender sexuality national origin age disability genetics or any other protected statusltbrgtltbrgtWere dedicated to creating an inclusive equitable and diverse workplace where everyone feels safe to be themselves and diversity is a strength WELL is committed to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment WELL will not tolerate discrimination or harassment of any kind
